name: Get Confused
description:
@M_lon - With this coin you are entitled to a get a confused avatar of your amazing / smooth / hairy / funny / freckly / beautiful / etc face.
Once you get the coin, send me a message with your photo and you will receive your avatar within the next 5 days of your purchase.
(THIS IS AN EXPERIMENT, SO LET'S GIVE IT A GO)

These series of avatars are inspired by my journey through the NFTs world. The first few people I engaged with and hopefully many more to come.
The first TEN portraits are from an amazing NFT Community of Venezuelan legends who welcomed me and helped me to start.

Chromatic Aberration as a technique, comes from my relationship with presbyopia, and with it, I invite you to see through my eyes (when I’m not wearing glasses).

Confused Avatars is about celebrating the inclusion and acknowledgement of digital arts as a very important medium of self-expression, and allowing us to challenge now which medium is worth more? - Digital or analogue?
